segments.text: Good evening , sir , and welcome to Chez Attitude .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a dinner reservation for four at 7:00 under the name of Foster .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Mr . Foster , if you would please be seated over in the waiting area , our hostess will be with you in a moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . Would it be OK if we have a cocktail while we are waiting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course , I will tell her .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would really prefer an outside table . Would that be possible ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , if you would like one of those tables , I could seat you right away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , that would be great ! Thank you !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here are your menus and the wine menu , and would you like to order your drinks now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like a vodka gimlet , please .
segments.speaker: S2
